titleStmt.title: Evan's gamesome frollick; or, Peter's sorrowful lamentation for the loss of his Jenny. 'Tis Peter's wife that leads a life which makes his heart to ake; While Evan he, and Jenny she, will still their pleasure take. This may be printed, R.P.

Evan's gamesome frollick; or, Peter's sorrowful lamentation for the loss of his Jenny. 'Tis Peter's wife that leads a life which makes his heart to ake; While Evan he, and Jenny she, will still their pleasure take. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Back at the Black Boy on London-Bridge, near the Draw-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse - "Come listen a while, and I here will unfold".
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
